intension: Design a real estate rental property flyer featuring a cozy interior with wooden furniture and a brown textile sofa. The flyer should include the property address, contact information, rental price, number of beds, baths, and square feet. Additionally, showcase extra perks such as bicycle storage, a children's playroom, and a roof deck.
globalcaption: The image features a brown leather couch placed in a living room. The couch is positioned in the center of the room, with a chair nearby. There is a dining table located towards the right side of the room. \n\nIn addition to the furniture, there are two vases placed in the room, one on the left side and the other on the right side. A potted plant can be seen in the background, adding a touch of greenery to the space. The room appears to be well-organized and inviting.
keywords: house, home, property, apartment, rent, real estate, interior, design, leather, brown, sofa, flyer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a brown leather couch sitting in a room with a white wall. The couch is positioned against the wall, and there is a small table in front of it. On the table, there is a vase and a bowl. The room appears to be empty, with no other objects or people visible in the scene
